rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Dining Area

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with modern fixtures and open storage, designed to be energy-efficient while incorporating bohemian touches like reclaimed wood accents.

rooms.name: Utility/Service
rooms.description: Small service area for washing and maintenance, ensuring efficient use of space in line with budget constraints.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed to allow a seamless flow of positive energy, aligning with Vastu principles for prosperity.
Large windows to ensure ample natural light and ventilation in the living areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to be versatile and functional, with storage solutions for a tidy space.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom that can serve as guest or additional family room, designed with budget-friendly yet aesthetic touches.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: ensuite for the master bedroom with a bathtub and essential fixtures, ensuring privacy and convenience.
